snippet: The United States shockingly ranks at or near the bottom compared with other advanced nations.
abstract: Editorial highlights findings of report issued by Institute of Medicine, which shows that Americans experience higher rates of disease and injury and die sooner than people in other high-income countries; expresses support for panel's suggestion of campaign to raise public awareness of American health disadvantage and study of what other countries are doing that may be useful in United States.
lead_paragraph: The United States shockingly ranks at or near the bottom compared with other advanced nations.
